comment: Кучка мародеров сидит у костра. Первый

languages.text: "А слыхали вы про Смеющегося гонщика? Того, что каждый раз на арене гибнет, а потом здесь встает живьем и уходит..."
"Have you heard of the Laughing Racer? The one who dies in the arena every time, and then stands up alive and walks away..."
languages.original_text: "А слыхали вы про Смеющегося гонщика? Того, что каждый раз на арене гибнет, а потом здесь встает живьем и уходит..."

traits.locale_text: "Have you heard of the Laughing Racer? The one who dies in the arena each time, and then gets up alive and walks away after they drag him here..."
"Have you heard of the Laughing Racer? The one who dies in the arena each time, and then gets up alive and walks away after they drag him here..."
"Have you heard of the Laughing Racer? The one who dies in the arena every time, and then stands up alive and walks away..."
"Have you heard of the Laughing Racer? The one who dies in the arena every time, and then stands up alive and walks away..."
"Have you heard of the Laughing Racer? The one who dies in the arena every time, and then stands up alive and walks away..."

languages.text: “你听说过狂笑杀手吗？他每次都会在竞技场上被杀，之后再重新复活，离开竞技场……”
languages.original_text: "Have you heard of the Laughing Racer? The one who dies in the arena every time, and then stands up alive and walks away..."

traits.locale_text: “你听说过狂笑杀手吗？他每次都会在竞技场上被杀，之后再重新复活，离开竞技场……”

languages.text: 「笑う競走者について聞いたことは？アリーナで毎回命を落としては生きて立ち上がり去っていくという…」
languages.original_text: "Have you heard of the Laughing Racer? The one who dies in the arena every time, and then stands up alive and walks away..."

traits.locale_text: 「笑う競走者について聞いたことは？アリーナで毎回命を落としては生きて立ち上がり去っていくという…」

languages.text: « Vous avez entendu parler du coureur ricanant ? Celui qui meurt chaque fois dans l'arène, mais qui se relève toujours avant de s'en aller... »
languages.original_text: "Have you heard of the Laughing Racer? The one who dies in the arena every time, and then stands up alive and walks away..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez entendu parler du coureur ricanant ? Celui qui meurt chaque fois dans l'arène, mais qui se relève toujours avant de s'en aller... »

languages.text: «¿Has oído algo del corredor que ríe? El que siempre muere en la arena, resucita y se va caminando...».
languages.original_text: "Have you heard of the Laughing Racer? The one who dies in the arena every time, and then stands up alive and walks away..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Has oído algo del corredor que ríe? El que siempre muere en la arena, resucita y se va caminando...».

languages.text: "Habt Ihr schon vom Lachenden Raser gehört? Der Typ, der in der Arena jedes Mal stirbt und dann putzmunter aufsteht und davonspaziert?"
languages.original_text: "Have you heard of the Laughing Racer? The one who dies in the arena every time, and then stands up alive and walks away..."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr schon vom Lachenden Raser gehört? Der Typ, der in der Arena jedes Mal stirbt und dann putzmunter aufsteht und davonspaziert?"

languages.text: "Gülen Gladyatör'ün adı kulağına çalındı mı hiç? Sürekli arenada ölüyor, sonra da diriliveriyormuş..."
languages.original_text: "Have you heard of the Laughing Racer? The one who dies in the arena every time, and then stands up alive and walks away..."

traits.locale_text: "Şen Gladyatör'ün adı kulağına çalındı mı hiç? Sürekli arenada ölüyor, sonra da diriliveriyormuş..."
